project_plan.name: Weather Fetcher CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python CLI application to fetch and display the current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Research and select a suitable public API for fetching weather data
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the API
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a CLI interface to accept user input for the city name
Display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
